text: Jin logon ne kufr ki raah ikhtiyar ki hai unke liye duniya ki zindagi badi mehboob o dil pasand bana di gayi hai, aisey log iman ki raah ikhtiyar karne walon ka mazaq udhate hain, magar qayamat ke roz parheizgaar log hi unke muqable mein aali muqaam honge, raha duniya ka rizq, to Allah ko ikhtiyar hai jisey chahe be-hisaab de
